equipment.description: Perfect for cinematic wedding shots with 5.1K Apple ProRes recording and omnidirectional obstacle sensing.

hero.title: Ready to Capture the Sky?

form.title: Request a Quote
form.subtitle: Details help us fly safer and smarter. Tell us about your mission.

weather.q: Do you fly in bad weather?
weather.a: No. For safety and equipment integrity, we do not fly in heavy rain, snow, or high winds (above 20mph). We can reschedule for free if conditions are unsafe.

licensed.a: Yes. All pilots hold valid FAA Part 107 certificates. We carry $1M liability insurance for all commercial operations.

turnaround.a: Edited images within 24-48 hours. Video projects typically take 3-5 business days depending on complexity.

present.q: Do I need to be present?
present.a: Not always, as long as we have access and a shot list. However, being on-site is recommended for creative direction.

events.title: Events & Festivals
events.description: Cinematic live coverage for large-scale festivals, concerts, and private events.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: 4K aerial tours and photography for premium residential and commercial listings.

3dScans.title: 3D Scans
3dScans.description: High-precision photogrammetry, LIDAR, and architectural mapping for surveying.

fpv.title: Sports FPV

mavic3.name: Mavic 3 Cine
